textAfterTable: Game Overview Fossil Fighters: Frontier is a role-playing video game developed by Red Entertainment and Spike Chunsoft and published by Nintendo for the Nintendo 3DS. Fossil Fighters: Frontier is the third entry in the Fossil Fighters series where players find fossils and turn them into dinosaurs.
